notes: Barricade closing McLeod @ Regent. No thru traffic -- local only when no runners. Apartment residents on McLeod and Church attendees (Atkins Pewter bldg.) can access parking lot before St John street when no runners.

loc_label: Aberdeen Street and Queen Sq. (Finish/Marathon Loop)
notes: Relocated resources from downtown closures once re-opened. Support with crowd control at finish line to ensure that runners in the Marathon have space to make the loop.  Any runner later than 10:45 a.m. will not be permitted to continue.
